justification: "After completing the task, participants filled out a TIPI 10-item personality measure (65)" indicates that the Big Five personality dimensions were assessed with the TIPI.

"The task was based on the Daw two-step decision making task (67). The goal of this project was to examine whether people choose between model-free versus model-based control…" shows that the Two-Step task serves as the measure of model-based/model-free control.

"In phase 1, we designed a simple RL task that allows us to capture participants' estimation of a probability of reward across multiple trials" describes the phone-inspection task as the instrument to measure participants’ probabilistic learning or reward-probability estimation.
